A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s refreshing to see this film tread new ground\, the relationship between Kylo and Rey is probably the most complex and nuanced that we’ve ever seen in a Star Wars film. The new direction had me feeling more like the first time I watched Return of the Jedi than in any of the 5 films that followed after. The hate this film is grabbing is unwarranted and based only on unmet expectations. It’s fine to not like the direction the film took\, but that in no way shape or form makes it a bad film. To state otherwise only serves to make you look foolish.
